title: How advanced is a 2020 car compared to 1920? - Quora

response.answer_text: Imagine a var with an ignition system and fuel system simular to a cheap lawnmower. Then imagine a rudimentary electric system,no power steering,no power brakes,no ABS or launch control,no radio,no entertainment system and no GPS. Then remember that a cheap family car in 1920 only could reach about 45 mph.  1920,Ford model T,65 Km/h  2020,East european Skoda,electronically limited to 250 km/h Both these cars are typical family sedans of their time!

“How advanced is a 2020 car compared to a 1920?” Let me count the ways. A 2020 car has so many gizmos that a trained factory mechanic may not be able to fix it. A 1920 car would have so many gizmos, yet a village smithy with a 5th grade education could probably rebuilt the entire vehicle. In a day.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Aaron Bryce Anderson
